author: Christina Coulter
title: Florida woman, 33, 'used $15,000 pandemic relief loan to bankroll a hit on TSA agent who stole her boyfriend': Victim, 24, was gunned down outside her Miami home in front of her three-year-old daughter

sentence: — Rep. Jim Jordan (@Jim_Jordan) March 17, 2022 Last week, the TSA announced the decision to extend the mask mandate — which was set to expire Friday, March 18 — another month.
author: Hannah Bleau
title: Jim Jordan: ‘End’ the TSA Mask Mandate

sentence: Representative Jim Jordan, one of the co-founders of the House Freedom Caucus and one of Donald Trump’s fiercest apologists in Congress, had nothing to say when The Independent asked about his remarks.
author: Eric Garcia
title: Madison Cawthorn’s comments angered House Republicans. He was already in trouble back home
